entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers at times heavy. Temperature rising to 12 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending before morning then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Temperature rising to 12 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:22 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
